en: Lie down on your back, allowing your body to fully relax into the mat.
enSynonyms: Assume a reclined position on the floor.
Position yourself flat on your back.
Gently lower yourself onto your back, ensuring your spine is aligned.
Settle into a supine posture, letting your limbs rest comfortably.

en: Raise your legs upward, maintaining a straight posture.
Now, begin circling your legs in a controlled clockwise motion, engaging your core while maintaining fluid continuity.
enSynonyms: Start tracing circular movements with your legs in one direction
Commence slow, deliberate leg circles keeping them aligned
As you exhale, guide your legs through smooth orbital patterns in a single plane
Gently initiate rotational leg movements in a chosen direction, ensuring steady breath throughout

en: Reverse the direction of your leg circles.

enSynonyms: Take a brief pause now.
Have a quick break now.
Rest for a moment now.
Take a short breather now.
Pause briefly to rest now.
Allow yourself a small break now.
Take a moment to relax now.
Have a quick rest for a while.
Pause for a short rest now.
Relax for a brief moment now.
Take a short moment to recover now.
Give yourself a quick pause now.
Take this time for a short rest.
Have a moment to catch your breath now.
Rest for a little while now.
Enjoy a brief pause to refresh now.
Take a small break to relax now.
Pause to rest for a short while.
Allow a brief moment of rest now.
Take a short recovery break now.

en: As soon as you ready start doing prayer crunches.
As soon as you ready for scissor kicks start doing them.
